Methods

ApplyToTransforms(MatrixTransform)

Applies the viewport transforms to a MatrixTransform. The matrix represents: screenPos = canvasPos * zoom + offset

public void ApplyToTransforms(MatrixTransform transform)

Fits the viewport to show a bounding box with padding.

GetVisibleRect()

Gets the visible area in canvas coordinates. Returns a Rect with Width=0 if view size is not set.

Resets zoom to 100%, keeping the current view center.

Parameters

SetZoom(double, Point?)

Sets the zoom level, optionally zooming towards a specific point. If no zoom center is provided, zooms towards the center of the view.

public void SetZoom(double newZoom, Point? zoomCenter = null)

Parameters

newZoom double
zoomCenter Point?

UpdateSettings(FlowCanvasSettings)

Updates the settings used by this viewport.

public void UpdateSettings(FlowCanvasSettings settings)

Parameters

settings FlowCanvasSettings

The new settings to use.

Zooms in by one step, centered on the view.

public void ZoomIn(Point? zoomCenter = null)

zoomCenter Point?

Zooms out by one step, centered on the view.
